alert.note: Alert for Irion; Sterling; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 11:04PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Sterling, west central Tom Green and northwestern Irion Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1102 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms 14 miles east of Saint Lawrence, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Sterling, the Panhandle of Tom Green, and northwestern Irion Counties but may approach Sterling City by 1045 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
